Name: Magic Heart
About the game: Visual Novel, ADV, Fantasy, Romance, Yuri Eve has a dream to develop magic abilities and return to her homeland, but she suddenly develops close relationships with her two female friends instead. Features: • two possible love interests; • colorful illustrations; • three endings.
